question: It has a bark, but no bite. What is it?
What goes up but never goes down?
What has a neck but no head?
You can keep it only after giving it away to someone else. What is it?
What is so delicate that saying its name breaks it?
What starts with a 'P', ends with an 'E'and has thousands of letters?
The one who makes me does not need me, when he makes me. The one who buys me does not use me for himself or herself. The one who uses me doesn't know that he or she is using me. What am I?
What belongs to you but others use it more than you do?
What goes up the chimney when down, but cannot go down the chimney when up?
As I went across the bridge, I met a man with a load of wood which was neither straight nor crooked. What kind of wood was it?
